buffer (31 of 42 overloads)

Create a new non-modifiable buffer that represents the given string_view. 

template<
    typename Elem,
    typename Traits>
const_buffer buffer(
    basic_string_view< Elem, Traits > data);
Return Value

mutable_buffer(data.size() ? &data[0] : 0, data.size() * sizeof(Elem)).
